sentences.en: As a musician I owe much to the radio station in my home town.
sentences.cn: 作为一名音乐家，我非常感激我家乡的广播电台。

sentences.en: As a professional composer I owe much to Radio 3.
sentences.cn: 作为一名职业作曲家，我十分感激第三电台。

sentences.en: Can you tot up how much I owe you?
sentences.cn: 你能算一下我总共欠你多少钱 吗 ?

sentences.en: He owes his success to hard work.
sentences.cn: 他的成功是靠勤奋工作。

sentences.en: He probably owes his life to her prompt action.
sentences.cn: 很可能是因为她行动迅速，才救了他一命。

sentences.en: He's been fantastic. I owe him a lot.
sentences.cn: 他真是个大好人，我欠他太多了。

sentences.en: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.cn: 我该付你多少钱？

sentences.en: I can't go. I owe it to him to stay.
sentences.cn: 我不能走。看在他的分上我也该留下来。

sentences.en: I owe a big debt of gratitude to her.
sentences.cn: 我对她万分感激。

sentences.en: I owe him my life.
sentences.cn: 我能活下来全亏了他。

sentences.en: I owe the restoration of my hearing to this remarkable new technique.
sentences.cn: 我之所以能恢复听觉完全是因为采用了这项非凡的新技术.

sentences.en: I owe them a debt that cannot easily be repaid.
sentences.cn: 我欠他们一笔钱，不容易偿还。

sentences.en: I'm broke, Livy, and I owe a couple of million dollars.
sentences.cn: 我破产了，莉薇，而且我欠了几百万美元的债。

sentences.en: Perhaps we owe these people more respect.
sentences.cn: 也许我们应该给予这些人更多的尊重。

sentences.en: Rest assured, if you owe taxes, we will collect them.
sentences.cn: 不用多想，如果你欠税，我们会去收的。

sentences.en: thanks, I owe you one for this.
sentences.cn: 谢了，为这个我欠你的情。

sentences.en: The company owes money to more than 60 banks.
sentences.cn: 这家公司欠六十多家银行的钱。

sentences.en: They are now realising just how much they owe to kind-hearted strangers.
sentences.cn: 他们现在开始意识到那些心地善良的陌生人帮了他们多大的忙。

sentences.en: they think the world owes them a living.
sentences.cn: 他们认为这个世界应该白白养活他们。

sentences.en: You don't owe me. I don't owe you. We're even.
sentences.cn: 你不欠我，我也不欠你，我们扯平了。

sentences.en: You owe a certain person a sum of money.
sentences.cn: 你欠某人一笔钱。

sentences.en: You owe it to yourself to get some professional help.
sentences.cn: 你应该为了自己寻求专业人士的帮助。

sentences.en: you owe it to yourself to take care of your body.
sentences.cn: 为了你自己你必须爱护你的身体。

phrases.phrase: owe it to oneself (to do something)
phrases.tran_cn: 为了自己有必要做某事
[用于对指望不劳而获的人表示不 满] …应该白白养活某人

trans.tran_cn: 欠钱/情，应把…归因于，服从，有必要为
trans.tran_en: to need to pay someone for something that they have done for you or sold to you, or to need to give someone back money that they have lent you

trans.tran_cn: 欠； 应把…归功于； 感激， 感恩
trans.tran_en: to be successful because of the good effect or influence of something or someone
